newsitem.title: GERMANY: Buba allots 65.1 bln marks in tender at 3 pct.
newsitem.headline: Buba allots 65.1 bln marks in tender at 3 pct.

text.p: The Bundesbank on Wednesday said it allocated 65.1 billion marks in 14-day securities repurchase funds at this week's tender at a fixed three percent rate.
A repo pact for 67.5 billion marks at a fixed three percent rate percent expires today, Wednesday, so a net 2.4 billion marks is draining from the market.
The Bundesbank said banks bid for 157.9 billion marks of the repurchase funds this week. It accepted 41.25 percent of the bids.
